basics.name: Chris J. Kolenko

Demonstrated success in leading transformational projects, driving cost reductions, and simplifying complex systems. Expert in fostering innovation and building high-performing teams by cultivating a DevOps culture and implementing Shift Left principles. A master of Lean Methodology, skilled in taking experimental spikes to production, leveraging data-driven insights to iteratively refine product design and enhance decision-making.
